snippet.title: Shut the Window - iOS and Mac App Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Shut the Window launches on April 5, 2018 on iOS and Mac App Store. 

Pre-order the game for iOS here – https://goo.gl/Lrskw3

Pre-order the game for Mac here - https://goo.gl/uncZv2

Shut the Window is a one-touch​ game where you have to close as many open windows as possible before the timer runs out. Inspired by real windows of Amsterdam, play through 10 handcrafted illustrations. Frustratingly fun, each design has its own charm. Try not to pull your hair out playing it.

-------------

Visit The Website:
http://www.shutthewindow.com
Follow Shut the Window On Facebook: 
https://www.facebook.com/shutthewindow/
Follow Shut the Window on Twitter: 
https://twitter.com/shuthewindow
Follow Shut the Window on Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/shuthewindow/
